name: Solaris Air Combat
description:
Set the clouds on fire and wreck the enemies' spaceships in Gem Rose Accent's 3D arcade shooter Solaris Air Combat! Select your ship and weapons to reclaim Solaris' glorious cloud sceneries from the rivals by destroying all their fleet, and set new high scores!

EARLY ACCESS. This means that the game is being developed and has bugs and many unfinished features, but you can still buy it if you want to try and give feedback. You'll get a Steam key when the game is completely finished. Also note that the price may change (higher or lower) when the game is released.
